content: Transmission line T-Line-88 connects Eastside Gas Plant (ENG-33) to Central Load Center. 345 kV rating.
metadata: Line length: 120 miles, installed: 2020, next inspection: 2025-10

content: Substation Sub-A11 in North District steps down 345 kV to 138 kV. Key node for Riverbank Station RBC-12.
Smart meter rollout in West District. 10,000 residential units installed, plan to expand to 5,000 more.
metadata: Program: GreenHomes, start date: 2025-02, saves ~8% average consumption

content: Wind farm GWF-19 ties into Transmission corridor T-Corridor-7, requiring reactive power compensation.
metadata: Voltage regulation device: SVC, next upgrade: 2025-09

content: Battery storage pilot at SSF-07 provides frequency regulation to West District. 50 MWh capacity.
